name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in backend system design and development. Proficient in **AWS**, **GCP**, and **MongoDB**, leveraging **Python** (including **Django**, **FastAPI**, and **Flask**) for high-performance API development. Demonstrated expertise in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, with knowledge of **Vue.js** for front-end integration. Skilled in implementing **NoSQL** databases like **DynamoDB** and managing CI/CD pipelines using **CircleCI** and **GitHub Actions**. Strong understanding of **Event-Driven** architecture and proficient in using tools like **Kubernetes**, **Celery**, and **DataDog** for observability and monitoring. Committed to agile methodologies, enhancing collaboration, and fostering a growth mindset to drive customer-focused solutions. Proven success in contributing to significant projects at leading organizations, including VISA and Sii Poland.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer backend services, enhancing document automation and user onboarding processes up to **30%** faster.
Developed event-driven architectures using **Celery** and **Redis** for efficient asynchronous processing of financial transactions, improving processing time by **25%**.
Deployed microservices on **AWS** and **GCP**, with automated infrastructure management using **Terraform**, ensuring reliable and scalable cloud operations.
Created and maintained data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving over **99%** accuracy in regulatory data exchange.
Conducted comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication systems, reducing security incidents by **40%**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to solve system integration challenges and improve release strategies, contributing to an **80%** reduction in deployment timelines.
Employed **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** for seamless CI/CD processes, enhancing deployment efficiency and reliability.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to ensure consistent environments with **99% uptime**.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate data flow with processing speeds improved by **30%**.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for authentication and secure access controls across **5+ applications**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management in an **Agile** environment, enhancing customer focus and collaboration.

Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.

- Designed and implemented scalable architectures on **AWS** and **GCP** to ensure high availability and fault tolerance for up to **1000** simultaneous transactions.
- Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, minimizing latency to under **200ms**.
- Collaborated closely with frontend teams using **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring seamless user experiences and high customer satisfaction ratings exceeding **95%**.
- Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while following internal data security protocols to protect customer information.
- Implemented comprehensive test automation using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes and reducing deployment times by **30%**.
- Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and improving operational efficiency by **20%**.
- Fostered a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement through an **Agile** development approach, embracing a growth mindset and ensuring customer focus in solutions.
